Innovation Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Innovation Center      Innovation Center   Main Menu    Partners           Corporate Partners    UIC Partners    Value         Applied Work           Labs    Sponsored Classes         Approach           Where We Fit    Horizon 2    Methodology         Partner History    About Us           Our Faculty    Our Staff    Job Opportunities          Eyebrow menu    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Innovation Center       Innovation Center  A center for innovation, education, and collaboration.             Innovation ✚ Our innovation practice and methods are applied within corporate-funded interdisciplinary classes, labs, and sponsored projects. Students develop innovative solutions to complex problems guided by faculty from multiple disciplines and design thinking methodologies. Education ✚ We produce innovators through this collaborative practice, and believe innovation is both the outcome of a structured & creative process, and the process itself. Collaboration ✚ We are uniquely positioned within UIC to bring corporate partners together with faculty and students from multiple colleges.
